name: Lust in the Mummy's Tomb
description:
drink the drink or scoop the juice help niso help richard steal the mummy's bone juice is it cursed or is it a cure?

made in a frantic morning for RPG Maker Jam 3.
probably about 20 minutes long.
probably real buggy. enjoy < 3


note: game based on my own set of mummy's curses. I have 
been suffering from the mummy's curse for over a dozen
months now. 

"Play By Your Own Runes"
nilson
